CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Comments.​Parsers.​Javadoc
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Comments.​Parser
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Comments.​Parsers.​Javadoc

A parser to handle the Javadoc comment format.

Tag Support
Supported Javadoc Tags

  • @author

  • @deprecated

  • @exception

  • @param

  • @return

  • @see

  • @since

  • @throws

  • @version

  • {@code}

  • {@link}

  • {@linkPlain}

  • {@literal}

Supported HTML Tags

  • p

  • b, i, u, strong (converted to b), em (converted to i)

  • pre

  • ul, ol (converted to ul), li

  • a href for absolute URLs and e-mail addresses

Unsupported

  • @serial

  • @serialField

  • @serialData

  • {@docRoot}

  • {@inheritDoc}

  • {@value}

    • If a target is provided, it will be added as a link.

  • Custom Javadoc tags

  • a href with relative or {@docRoot} URLs

    • These links are removed since they likely depend on the Javadoc output file structure.

  • Mixed left lines

    • Natural Docs supports either having a horizontal line on the left side of the comment or not having one.  Javadoc also supports having the left line partially exist so that you can have a line of stars normally but still paste a code segment in without reformatting it.  Natural Docs does not support this.

Types
GetTextMode
public enum GetTextMode : byte
Functions
Javadoc
public Javadoc (
Comments.Manager manager
)
Parse
public bool Parse (
PossibleDocumentationComment sourceComment,
List<Topic> topics
)

Attempts to parse the passed comment into Topics.  Returns whether it was successful, and if so, adds them to the list.  These fields will be set:

  • CommentLineNumber

  • Body, if present

  • Summary, if available

HasAnyTag
protected bool HasAnyTag (
TokenIterator start,
TokenIterator end
)

Whether the passed block of text contains any Javadoc tags at all.

IsFirstBlockLine
protected bool IsFirstBlockLine (
LineIterator lineIterator
)

Whether the iterator is on a line that starts with one of the BlockTags.

TryToGetFirstBlockLine
protected bool TryToGetFirstBlockLine (
LineIterator lineIterator,
out string tag,
out TokenIterator startOfContent
)

If the iterator is on a line that starts with one of the BlockTags, extracts the components and returns true.  Use <GetBlockTag()> to get the complete block since it may span multiple lines.

TryToGetBlock
protected bool TryToGetBlock (
ref LineIterator lineIterator,
LineIterator limit,
JavadocComment comment
)

If the iterator is on a line that starts with one of the BlockTags, parses it, adds its content to the comment, moves the iterator past it, and returns true.  If it is not at the start of a tag block it will return false and change nothing.

TryToGetBlockSymbol
protected bool TryToGetBlockSymbol (
ref TokenIterator iterator,
TokenIterator limit,
out string entryText
)

If the iterator is on the symbol part of a block tag that has one, such as "@param symbol description", extracts the symbol, moves the iterator past it, and returns true.

GetText
protected string GetText (
LineIterator start,
LineIterator end
)
GetText
protected string GetText (
TokenIterator start,
TokenIterator end
)
GetText
protected void GetText (
ref JavadocIterator iterator,
StringBuilder output,
GetTextMode mode = GetTextMode.Normal
)

Converts a stretch of formatted text to NDMarkup.

Modes
Normal

The iterator continues until it goes out of bounds.

ListItem

The iterator continues until it reaches a closing li tag.  It also skips certain formatting that is not supported in list items in NDMarkup.

GetSimpleText
protected string GetSimpleText (
TokenIterator start,
TokenIterator end
)
GetSimpleText
protected void GetSimpleText (
ref JavadocIterator iterator,
StringBuilder output
)

Converts a stretch of text to NDMarkup, ignoring the formatting.  Unlike GetText() this will not surround the output in paragraph tags.

GetPre
protected void GetPre (
ref JavadocIterator iterator,
StringBuilder output
)

Converts the contents of a pre tag to NDMarkup and adds it to the output.  The iterator should be on an opening pre tag and when it ends it will be past the closing tag.

GetList
protected void GetList (
ref JavadocIterator iterator,
StringBuilder output
)

Converts the contents of a ul or ol list to NDMarkup and adds it to the output.  The iterator should be on an opening list tag and when it ends it will be past the closing tag.

GetHTMLLink
protected void GetHTMLLink (
ref JavadocIterator iterator,
StringBuilder output
)

Converts the contents of an a href tag to NDMarkup and adds it to the output.  The iterator should be on an opening link tag and when it ends it will be past the closing tag.

GetJavadocLinkSymbol
protected string GetJavadocLinkSymbol (
ref TokenIterator iterator
)

Returns the symbol part of a @see or {@link} tag and moves the iterator past it.

GenerateTopic
protected Topic GenerateTopic (
JavadocComment comment
)

Creates and returns a Topic from the JavadocComment and returns it.  If the comment contains no useful content it will return null.
